Title: Authorizes the justice center to create a central registry for employees
Summary: Authorizes the justice center to create a central registry for employees for all current and prospective agencies, sponsoring agencies or other providers of services that are certified, authorized, approved or funded through contract by the office for people with developmental disabilities to streamline criminal background checks.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to authorizing the justice center for the protection of people with special needs to create a central registry for employees
